```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(consensus)
```


There are three options

1. Candidates for the names are given
2. Candidates for the names are not give

```{r}
r1 <- c(3, 8, 1, 2, 5)
r1 <- ranking(r1)
r1

r2 <- c(3, 8, 1, 2, 5)
names(r2) <- letters[1:5]
r2 <- ranking(r2)
r2

r3 <- c(3, 8, 1, 2, 5)
names(r3) <- c(letters[1:4], letters[1])
r3 <- ranking(r3)
r3

r4 <- c(3, 8, 1, 2, 5)
r4

r5 <- c(3, 1, 1, 3, 3)
names(r5) <- letters[1:5]
r5
```

```{r}
as.numeric(r1)
is.ranking(r1)
as.numeric(r2)
is.ranking(r2)
as.numeric(r3)
is.ranking(r3)
as.numeric(r4)
is.ranking(r4)
as.numeric(r5)
is.ranking(r5)
```
